fullForm: Jawaharlal Institute of Postgraduate Medical Education and Research Nursing Officer Recruitment
conductingBody: Jawaharlal Institute of Postgraduate Medical Education & Research (JIPMER), Puducherry
eligibility: Candidates must possess a B.Sc. (Hons.) Nursing / B.Sc. Nursing from an Indian Nursing Council/State Nursing Council recognized Institute or University OR Diploma in General Nursing and Midwifery from an Indian Nursing Council/State Nursing Council recognized Institute/Board or Council and registered as Nurse and Midwife in State/Indian Nursing Council. Age limit is generally up to 32 years for direct recruitment.
negativeMarking: 1 mark deducted for each wrong answer

faqs.question: What is the selection process for JIPMER Nursing Officer?
faqs.answer: The selection process consists of a Computer-Based Test (CBT) followed by document verification for shortlisted candidates.
